name: Rick
line: Anyway, that's how I escaped from space prison! Oh, scary place.

name: Morty
line: Wow, Rick! That's -- That's one -- one heck of a story. I sure do wish I could have been there to see it happen.

name: Rick
line: Oh, come on. Who wants to watch a mad scientist use handmade sci-fi tools to take out highly trained alien guards when we can sit here and be a family at Shoney's?

name: Beth
line: Dad, it's great to have you back, no matter where we are, but wouldn't you like to go home?

name: Rick
line: Emotionally speaking, honey, Shoney's is my home.

name: Jerry
line: Yeah, but you just got out of prison. I mean, how much of a step up from that is --

name: Rick
line: Jerry, get out of the booth, take all your clothes off, and fold yourself 12 times.

name: Jerry
line: You got it. [ Grunting ]

name: Rick
line: Six folds, huh? W-W-What, have you guys got me in a Series 9000? You cheap insect fucks didn't think I was worth your best equipment?

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: [ Chuckles ] Man, I told the money bugs. I said, "You know who this guy is, right? You want me to get intel out of the smartest mammal in the galaxy, you better give me a decent brainalyzer.

name: Rick
line: Well, you might as well order some pancakes, because I don't see the need to leave this part of my brain.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Oh, I think you do. Eventually, you're either gonna relax your cerebellum.

name: Rick
line: Shoney's.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Or the Series 9000 is going to turn it into mush.

name: Rick
line: Relaxed enough? [ Chuckles ]

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: I admire you, Rick--

name: Rick
line: [ Laughs ]

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: When I-- [ Farts ]

name: Rick
line: [ Laughs ]

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Rick, here's-- [ Farts ]

name: Rick
line: [ Laughs ]

name: Gromflomite Captain
line: What's going on?

name: Gromflomite Worker
line: It's hard to tell. He may have manifested some sort of butt.

name: Gromflomite Captain
line: He can do that?

name: Gromflomite Worker
line: He is the smartest man in the universe.

name: Jerry
line: [ Sighs contently ] I tell ya, the Galactic Federation taking over Earth -- best thing that's ever happened to this family. I just got my sixth promotion this week, and I still don't know what I do.

name: Summer
line: Who cares how high they promote you? Everyone just gets paid in pills.

name: Jerry
line: Well, when you're not sure what you do for a living, you can make your own rules.

name: Beth
line: Summer, show your father some respect. He's pulling down a six-chewable figure income.

name: Conroy
line: I'll get that in a moment. How are everyone's pills? Oh, Morty, you've hardly touched your pills.

name: Morty
line: I kind of had big pills for lunch, and I [muffled] wasn't gonna eat any more pills. [ Gulps ] Thank you, Conroy.

name: Jerry
line: You spoil us, Conroy.

name: Summer
line: [Slams hands on table] Grandpa Rick wouldn't put up with this!

name: Beth
line: [Bangs fist on table] Stop saying his name! He abandoned us.

name: Jerry
line: [Bangs fist on table] Willem Dafoe! Th-That's the guy I couldn't think of this morning.

name: Beth
line: Don't make my mistake, Summer. Don't deify the people that leave you. You'll end up a horse surgeon in a world controlled by aliens whose medicine keeps horses [ Sobs ] healthy forever. [ Sniffles ] Horses live longer than tortoises now. Is that what you want for yourself?

name: Summer
line: Maybe I just want you to care if I run away yelling!

name: Conroy
line: Who saved room for pill brûlée?

name: Jerry
line: Ooh! [ Chuckles ]

name: Convelious Daniel
line: I can see why you chose this family-friendly restaurant to represent your cerebellum. So safe, so comfortable, so Shoney's. But admit it, Rick -- you're going crazy cooped up in here. Let's go visit some memories.

name: Rick
line: Oh, any particular ones? You want to see my first boner, or should we go straight to the moment I discovered interdimensional travel?

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: [ Squeals ]

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: It's arousal. Yes, I'd like very much to visit the memory of you inventing your portal gun.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, well, tough titties.

name: Convelious Daniel
line: There's no tougher titty than a psychotic break, Rick.

name: Rick
line: Well, that depends on who breaks first -- me or the titty.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Someone special you remember? Is that your memory of her out there -- between where you were on 9/11 and your favorite sports blooper?

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: If we stay here, you'll die, along with all your memories. If you take me where I want to go she'll be there, too, won't she?

name: Rick
line: The day I invented the portal gun is the day I lost her.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Oh, that sounds cool. I can get what I want and you can say goodbye.

name: Rick
line: [ Sighs ] Fine, but I'm driving.

name: 9/11 Memory Rick
line: --as an excuse to strip away our freedom!

name: Morty
line: Huh? What are you -- What are you doing?

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick must have some secret lab, right? With, like, laser guns and jets packs and a space tank! And we can go break him out of prison! Look at these dead flies! Maybe if we arrange them in a certain order, it plays a hologram or it opens a secret door.

name: Morty
line: Summer, you're freaking me out. I know things have changed a lot, and I know you miss Rick, but getting him back wouldn't make things better. And, you know, we're not doing so bad.

name: Summer
line: We're miserable, Morty! There's a mandatory curfew, their weird calendar made me 47, and they weaponized the Eiffel Tower!

name: Morty
line: Hey, I like being 35. I-I can rent a car now.

name: Summer
line: Because you suck! You've been keeping your lip zipped about it since Grandpa got arrested, but the fact is, you're freaking stoked to bail on him.

name: Morty
line: He bails on everybody! He bailed on Mom when she was a kid! He -- He bailed on tiny planet! And in case I never made this clear to you, Summer, he bailed on you. He left you to rot in a world that he ruined because he doesn't care! Because nobody's special to him, Summer, not even himself. So, if you really want your grandpa back, grab a shovel. The one that won't let you down is buried in your backyard!

name: Summer
line: You're right!

name: Morty
line: What?! No, I'm not right. I-I was using ghoulish overkill! Ghoulish overkill, Summer!

name: Morty
line: Oh, God! Oh, God! Whoa, whoa!

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Where are we going?

name: Rick
line: To the day it all began and ended. The moment that changed everything.

name: McDonald's Drive-thru speaker
line: Welcome to McDonald's. Can I take your order?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, I'd like to get a 10-piece McNugget and a bunch of the Szechuan sauce. Like, as much as you're allowed to give me. In 1998, they had this promotion for the Disney film "Mulan," where they -- where they -- they created a new sauce for the McNuggets called Szechuan sauce, and it's delicious! And then they got rid of it, and now it's gone. This is the only place we're gonna be able to try it, is in my memory.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Rick, you're doing this bit while your brain is melting.

name: Rick
line: Okay. All right, all right.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Is that--

name: Rick
line: Me. I used to wear blue pants.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: When'd you make the leap to interdimensional travel?

name: Rick
line: I didn't. I did.

name: Alternate Rick
line: Well, well, well. If it isn't us. You know the worst part about inventing teleportation? Suddenly, you're able to travel the whole galaxy, and the first thing you learn is, you're the last guy to invent teleportation. Fortunately, you're about to invent something much more powerful.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: [ Squeals ]

name: Young Rick
line: What?

name: Morty
line: Summer, nobody has to know about that. We could put it right back and pretend we never saw it, like we did with Dad's mannequin leg.

name: Summer
line: Fine, stay here. I'll rescue Grandpa myself.

name: Morty
line: And how are you gonna do that?

name: Summer
line: I don't know yet. I'll make it up as I go. That's what Grandpa Rick does. That's what heroes do.

name: Morty
line: Y-You want to see what a hero Rick is? I-I'll bring you somewhere, Summer. Um-

name: Conroy
line: My goodness, children. [ Stern robotic voice ] Relinquish the illegal technology to the nearest Federation representative. [ Normal voice ] And then we'll all play Balderdash.

name: Conroy
line: Oh, my goodness! Oh, oh! My goo-- [ Crackling ]

name: Summer (C-137)
line: Oh, my God. I have that exact same top.

name: Summer
line: What is this place? And what's with "Hunger Games" Summer?

name: Morty
line: That's my sister. This used to be my home.

name: Alternate Rick
line: Imagine doing anything you want, then hopping to a timeline where you never did it. Imagine going anywhere, anytime, with nobody able to stop you.

name: Young Rick
line: Sounds lonely.

name: Alternate Rick
line: Lonely? Dude, you have yourself -- your infinite selves. It's a nonstop party where all the guests are the only person we like. You think it's cool being the smartest man on Earth, but once we give you this technology, you become the smartest thing in every conceivable universe -- the Infinite Rick, a god.

name: Young Rick
line: Eh, pass.

name: Alternate Rick
line: Excuse me? Bro, Ricks don't pass on this. Who do you think you are?

name: Young Rick
line: A different kind of Rick, I guess.

name: Alternate Rick
line: Well, we'll see how long that lasts.

name: Diane
line: I heard sci-fi noises. Did you make a breakthrough?

name: Young Rick
line: Sort of. I just took a long look at myself, and I don't think this science thing is gonna pay off.

name: Diane
line: Well, why don't I get Beth and we'll go out for ice cream?

name: Young Rick
line: That, Dianne, is the last great idea that will ever be had in this garage.

name: Summer
line: Good roasted Cronenberg, I assume. Mom, you're looking feral. I can't believe Rick did this.

name: Morty
line: These are the parts of Rick's adventures you don't get to see -- the parts he leaves behind. All right, it's been great, guys. I really only wanted to stop by here for a quick "I told ya so." So, uh--

name: Jerry (C-137)
line: Looking for this?

name: Morty
line: What are you doing with that?!

name: Jerry (C-137)
line: It stinks of Rick. [ Grunts ]

name: Morty
line: No! Why?! Why would you do that?! W-W-What is the matter with you people?!

name: Jerry (C-137)
line: You can never leave. She cannot remain.

name: Summer (C-137)
line: She stinks of Rick.

name: Morty
line: Hold your fire! Hold your fire! I'm Morty C-137.

name: Guard Rick
line: We detected a compromised portal gun. Where is your Rick?

name: Summer
line: He's in prison.

name: Morty
line: Summer.

name: Summer
line: He got captured by the Federation and we were going to rescue him.

name: Guard Rick
line: Very troubling. We can't risk Citadel secrets falling into the Federation's hands. We'll dispatch SEAL Team Ricks immediately to break into the prison holding C-137.

name: Summer
line: Boo-yah!

name: Guard Rick
line: Aand assassinate him.

name: Summer
line: Boo-nah?

name: Young Rick
line: Come on, girls! The ice cream's gonna melt.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: [ Munching ]

name: Young Rick
line: Nooooooo!

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Wow. This sauce is fucking amazing. You said it was promoting a movie? [ Slurping ]

name: Young Rick
line: Carry the three, add a two. I got it. I fucking got it.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Whoa. I-Is that it, the portal gun?

name: Rick
line: Yeah. That's the three lines of math that separates my life as a man from my life as an unfeeling ghost.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Awesome-possum. [ Whirring ] Mission Control, you getting this?

name: Gromflomite Worker
line: Holy shit, yes! Yes, we got it!

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Yeah! Thanks, Rick. I'll try to remember to shut off the brainalyzer. Actually, I think it shuts off automatically once your brain is liquid. Don't know, don't care. Pull me out. [ Beat ] Hey, pull me out! Can you hear me?

name: Rick
line: Nope, they cannot.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: Why not?

name: Rick
line: Because the code you just uploaded wasn't actually my portal-gun formula, it was a virus giving me full control over the brainalyzer.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: What are you talking about? This is a memory. Y-You can't alter details of a memory.

name: Rick
line: True, but you can alter anything you want about a totally fabricated origin story.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: It's a trap! Abort! I'm still in his Shoney's! Repeat -- we never left his Shoney's!

name: Rick
line: Mission accomplished, boys. Pull me out.

name: Gromflomite Worker
line: Roger that.

name: Rick
line: Okay, have fun in what's left of my brain. I'm gonna transfer to yours. Oh, there's not enough room for all my genius, so I'm leaving you with my fear of wicker furniture, my desire to play the trumpet, my tentative plans to purchase a hat, and six years of improv workshops. Comedy comes in threes.

name: Cornvelious Daniel
line: It's a trap! Abort! We never left his -- [ Farts ] [ Rick laughs ] No!

name: Cornvelious Daniel/Rick
line: Another day, another dollar. Am I right great insect creature or whaaat?!

name: Gromflomite Captain
line: Congratulations, Agent. You'll be highly commended for this.

name: Cornvelious Daniel/Rick
line: Always wait for permission to [burps] feel accomplishment. That's my motto.

name: Gromflomite Captain
line: One thing still perplexes me -- why would Rick Sanchez turn himself in?

name: Cornvelious Daniel/Rick
line: Well, I'm just a dumb-ass bug, but it's possible Rick knew he'd be interrogated at this facility, where we not only keep our most wanted, but our most sensitive data. Anyone here with level-nine access could [burps] I don't know, collapse a government. I'm just gonna go take a dump. Is it cool if I use the level-nine bathroom? W-W-What's the level-nine master access code again?

name: Gromflomite Worker
line: Oh, that's easy. 8-3--

name: SEAL Team Rick leader
line: Yeah! SEAL Team Rick's in the house!

name: SEAL Team Rick leader
line: D-99, y-you okay?

name: Rick (D-99)/Rick
line: I'm bummed I didn't get to give that insect dick a test-drive.

name: Braided Rick
line: Wait, wait, wait, wait! T-The Council of Ricks sent us. We have your Morty and Summer. They're prisoners on the Citadel.

name: Rick(D-99)/Rick
line: Great!

name: Braided Rick
line: [ Grunts ]

name: Speaker system
line: Security breach in room 6755.

name: Rick(D-99)/Rick
line: Lovely. Not only is my plan screwed up, I also forgot how to improvise.

name: Speaker system
line: All security people approach.

name: Rick(D-99)/Rick
line: [ Grunts ]

name: Speaker system
line: Security breach.

name: Summer
line: A city of Grandpas?

name: Morty
line: It's the Citadel of Ricks. All the different Ricks from all the different realities got together to hide here from the government.

name: Summer
line: But if every Rick hates the government, why would they hate Grandpa?

name: Morty
line: Because Ricks hate themselves the most. And our Rick is the most himself.

name: Guard Rick
line: Not anymore, homey. SEAL Team Ricks turned his unibrow into two brows -- with a bullet. [ Laughter ] Your Rick's dead! Your Rick's dead!

name: Worker Rick
line: Sir, Rick D-99 is returning from the mission alone. Apparently, SEAL Team Ricks suffered heavy casualties.

name: Commander in Chief Rick
line: Bring him in.

name: Worker Rick
line: He says he'll only talk to a Rick with higher clearance.

name: Commander in Chief Rick
line: La-di-da. Give me that. D-99, this is the commander in chief of the Citadel's militia.

name: Rick(D-99)/Rick
line: Go[burps] -- good enough.

name: Commander in Chief Rick/Rick
line: He's a spy. Blow him up. I'm gonna go take a shit.

name: Riq IV
line: Operating an unregistered portal gun, radicalizing a Summer, conspiring with a traitorous Rick. How do you plead?

name: Morty
line: How is this a fair trial? O-Our lawyer is a Morty.

name: Riq IV
line: It's not fair, you have no rights, and he's not a lawyer. We just keep him here because he's fun. Look at him go.

name: "Lawyer" Morty
line: [ Laughs ] Ha ha, yeah!

name: Riq IV
line: We'll be lenient if you renounce your Rick. What say you, Summer?

name: Summer
line: I say fuck you! My grandpa was my hero. You killed him because you were jealous of him. That's pretty obvious from the haircuts. So do what you want to me, but let my brother go. He already renounced Rick.

name: Riq IV
line: Morty?

name: "Lawyer" Morty
line: [ Whispers indistinctly ]

name: Morty
line: What? N-No, I don't want to see your Pog collection. I don't renounce Rick, and I never have. I was just trying to protect my sister. I wanted you to have a normal life. That's something you can't have when Rick shows up. Everything real turns fake. Everything right is wrong. All you know is that you know nothing and he knows everything. And, well -- well, he's not a villain, Summer, but he shouldn't be your hero. He's more like a demon or a super fucked up god.

name: Riq IV
line: Let's not suck the ghost of his dick too hard. He was a terrorist, and now he's dead.

name: Morty
line: Oh, yeah? If you think my Rick's dead, he's alive. And if you think you're safe, he's coming for you!

name: Council of Ricks
line: [ All grumbling ]

name: Teleportation Worker Rick
line: Hey, whoa, whoa! What are you doing in here? This area's for teleporting the entire Citadel to somewhere else using only buttons and dials.

name: Commander in Chief Rick/Rick
line: Yeah, well, it's a bad idea to have it designed that way then, isn't it?

name: Teleporter Worker Rick
line: What the fuck? We just teleported into a galactic federal prison.

name: Commander in Chief Rick/Rick
line: I'm gonna go take a shit.

name: "Lawyer" Morty
line: Order in the court! Whoa! What the hell?! Oh, my God!

name: Kidnapped Morty
line: [ Screaming ]

name: Random Rick
line: Wait, wait, wait, wait! No, no, no!

name: Hammerhead Morty
line: Whoa! [ Screaming ] Whoa!

name: Quantum Rick/Rick
line: The Citadel's been teleported to [burps] Federation space. It's doomed. This has to be C-137, you guys. What are we gonna do?! You know he's coming for us.

name: Riq IV
line: All right, calm down! We have his Summer as a hostage. Obviously, I get her. You guys play Rick, Laser, Scissors for the Morty.

name: Zeta Alpha Rick
line: W-W-What the hell is that?

name: Quantum Rick/Rick
line: Payback.

name: Council of Rick
line: [ Screaming ]

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick!

name: Rick
line: Duh!

name: Summer
line: You're alive!

name: Morty
line: Rick!

name: Rick
line: Morty, take this. You're gonna need it later.

name: Ricktiminus Sancheziminius
line: Hold on, hold on. Whoa!

name: Riq IV
line: That's enough, Rick.

name: Rick
line: What -- What's this supposed to accomplish? We have infinite grandkids. You're trying to use Disney bucks at a Caesar's Palace here.

name: Summer
line: That's a bluff. He's bluffing, sir. He loves me.

name: Riq IV
line: You're a rogue Rick -- irrational, passionate. You love your grandkids. You came to rescue them.

name: Rick
line: I came to kill you, bro. That's not even my original Summer.

name: Summer
line: Oh, my God. He's not bluffing. He's not bluffing!

name: Morty
line: R-Rick?

name: Riq IV
line: Why not shoot through her?

name: Rick
line: 20 yards, nine-gauge plasma pistol, My first shot would liquify her insides and injure you, second shot adds recoil. The risk to me is minimized if I wait for you to shoot her, which I'm encouraging you to do.

name: Summer
line: What the fuck?

name: Rick
line: Or let her go, which I will reward with a quicker death.

name: Riq IV
line: Because you love her!

name: Rick
line: Because it's incentive for you to give me my cleanest shot, which will be your least painful death. But if you want to die slower than that, I'm super into it. All you got to do to get that started is kill the girl.

name: Summer
line: I hate you!

name: Rick
line: Not an issue, sweetie.

name: Morty
line: That's enough! Drop the gun, Rick!

name: Rick
line: Morty, I know you're too stupid to get this, but you're really fuckin' this up right now.

name: Morty
line: I'm not letting you let my sister die! Drop the gun!

name: Rick
line: I wasn't gonna let her die, you fuckin' moron!

name: Riq IV
line: Ha!

name: Summer
line: Aww.

name: Rick
line: The point is he thought I was going to.

name: Riq IV
line: I totally did, by the way. You're a fucking moron, Morty.

name: Summer
line: Morty, you fucking idiot!

name: Rick
line: You're a serious fuckin' idiot, Morty! You basically killed us all! You're the worst! You're as dumb as a bag of sand.

name: Morty
line: Who's stupid now, bitch?!

name: Summer
line: Morty, we just got him back!

name: Riq IV
line: [ Laughs ] That was amazing, Morty. Oh, my God. Wow. Okay, let's wrap this-

name: Rick
line: Good job, Morty. Let's go, kids.

name: Summer
line: What?! What happened?

name: Rick
line: Oldest Rick trick in the book.

name: Summer
line: "Fake gun, shoot me in standoff." Brilliant.

name: Morty
line: Ha, yeah. G-Good thing I saw that note.

name: Summer
line: Can't we just portal home?

name: Rick
line: Not until I finish what I started. And that is how you get level-nine access without a password.

name: Gromflomite Guard
line: Freeze!

name: Rick
line: Employee of the month, ladies and gentlemen.

name: Morty
line: So, what are you doing with level-nine access anyways?

name: Rick
line: Destroying the [burps] galactic government.

name: Morty and Summer
line: Awesome! Whoa, cool!

name: Summer
line: Are you going to set all their nukes to target each other?

name: Morty
line: Ooh, or -- or reprogram their military portals to disintegrate their entire space fleet?

name: Rick
line: Good pitches, kids. I'm almost proud. But watch closely as Grandpa topples an empire by changing a one to a zero.

name: Federation worker 1
line: Mr. President, the Blemflarck's value just dropped to nothing.

name: Galactic Federation President
line: What do you mean?

name: Federation worker 1
line: I mean, our single centralized galactic currency just went from being worth one of itself to zero of itself.

name: Galactic Federation president
line: Calm down, people. Deploy the galactic militia and declare martial law.

name: Federation commander
line: Yes, sir. Uh, what should I pay them with?

name: Federation worker 2
line: Their payment is the honor they'll feel to serve their -- Wait. Who's paying me to yell at this guy?

name: Federation worker 3
line: I can answer that -- for money.

name: Federation worker 1
line: I never thought I'd live to see this day.

name: Galactic Federation President
line: Gentlemen, gentlemen, gentlemen! There's a solution here you're not seeing.

name: Federation worker 3
line: Give me your jacket!

name: Federation worker 1
line: Give me those pants!

name: Female Office Employee
line: There's no rich people or poor people! I want more jackets!

name: Gromflomite Office Employee
line: He who controls the pants controls the galaxy!

name: Jerry
line: [ Whimpering ] [ Gasps ] [ Whimpering ]

name: Mr. Goldenfold
line: No longer will the insects have domain over surface world!

name: Jerry
line: [ Whimpering ]

name: Beth
line: Jerry, what the hell is happening?!

name: Jerry
line: The galactic government collapsed.

name: Beth
line: Are you okay?

name: Jerry
line: Look, I-I'm not proud to share this, but the truth is, I just kept crawling, and it kept working. [ Gasps ] Oh, I'm glad you're okay. Are we ever going to stop paying for indulging your father? Our children, our planet, our jobs? Is there anything left to lose?

name: Beth
line: Just each other, and I'll never let you go. And I'm so sorry I ever did this to us.

name: Rick
line: Guess who dismantled the government?

name: Beth
line: Please don't leave me again.

name: Rick
line: I never will, baby.

name: Summer
line: I was right. He turned himself in on purpose. It was all part of his plan!

name: Rick
line: Jerry, is there any light beer left? It's insane what you miss in prison.

name: Jerry
line: Um..okay. No. No, no, no. Foot down time.

name: Rick
line: No, you're right. Where's the vodka?

name: Jerry
line: Beth, it's him or me!

name: Rick
line: Seems like you guys need some privacy. I'll, uh -- I'll be in the garage.

name: Rick
line: What the fuck? Not cool, Jerry! A man's garage is his castle.

name: Beth
line: Jerry's going to spend some time divorced.

name: Rick
line: Oh, I-I'm sorry to hear that, sweetie. I hope I had nothing to do with that.

name: Beth
line: Oh, God, Dad, that is not your burden to bear. I feel terrible that I misjudged you. This is gonna be good for Jerry.

name: Rick
line: For everybody.

name: Beth
line: For everybody.

name: Beth
line: I better tend to Jerry before he changes his mind and doesn't move out. I will leave you two to your adventures.

name: Summer
line: Oh, my God. Nancy says they're drawing and quartering aliens in the school courtyard, and it technically counts as patriotism.

name: Morty
line: Geez! Are my parents seriously gonna get divorced? All right, Rick, I'm gonna go to my --

name: Rick
line: Not so fast, Morty. You heard your mom. We've got adventures to go on, Morty -- just you and me -- and sometimes your sister and sometimes your mom, but never your dad. You want to know why, Morty? Because he crossed me.

name: Morty
line: Okay, take it easy, Rick. T-T-That's dark.

name: Rick
line: Oh, it gets darker, Morty. Welcome to the darkest year of our adventures. First thing that's different -- no more Dad, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Oh, geez.

name: Rick
line: He threatened to turn me in to the government, so I made him and the government go away.

name: Morty
line: Oh, fuck.

name: Rick
line: I've rep[burps]laced them both as the de facto patriarch of your family and your universe. Your mom wouldn't have accepted me if I came home -

name: Rick
line: - without you and your sister, so now you know the real reason I rescued you. Oh! I just took over the family, Morty, and if you tell your mom -

name: Morty
line: Oh, man.

name: Rick
line: - or sister I said any of this, I'll deny it -

name: Morty
line: You're gonna deny it.

name: Rick
line: - and they'll take my side because I'm a hero, Morty. And now you're gonna have to go -

name: Morty
line: Oh.

name: Rick
line: - and do whatever I say, Morty, forever! And I'll -- I'll go out and I'll find some more of that "Mulan" Szechuan teriyaki dipping sauce, Morty. -

name: Morty
line: What are you talking about?

name: Rick
line: - Because that's -- that's what this is all about, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Szechuan?

name: Rick
line: That's my one-armed man! I'm not driven by avenging my dead family, Morty! That was fake. I-I-I'm driven by finding that McNugget sauce.

name: Morty
line: McNuggets?

name: Rick
line: I want that "Mulan" McNugget sauce, Morty! That's my series arc, Morty.

name: Morty
line: What the hell?

name: Rick
line: If it takes nine seasons, I want my McNugget dipping sauce, Szechuan sauce, Morty.

name: Morty
line: What are you talking about, Rick?

name: Rick
line: That's what's gonna take us all the way to the end, Morty.

name: Morty
line: What are you talking about?!

name: Rick
line: Season -- Nine more seasons, Morty. Nine more seasons until I get that dipping Szechuan sauce.

name: Morty
line: What is that?!

name: Rick
line: For 97 more years, Morty!

name: Morty
line: What are you talking about?!

name: Rick
line: I want that McNugget sauce, Morty!

name: Tammy
line: Is it ready?

name: Gromflomite worker
line: Yes. We can bring it online now.

name: Tammy
line: Do it.

name: Birdperson
line: I am Phoenixperson.

name: Tammy
line: Phoenix Person? Is that what we settled on? I thought we all agreed on Cyberbird.

name: Gromflomite worker
line: You said you didn't care what he was called as long as we brought him back.

name: Tammy
line: Yeah, but Phoenixperson? Fine, fuck it. Who cares? [ Grunts ]

name: Phoenixperson
line: Ka-kaw!
